snippet: Prime Minister Kevin Rudd announced a plan to replace a deeply unpopular tax on carbon emissions with a market-based trading system a year ahead of schedule.
abstract: Australia's Prime Min Kevin Rudd announces plan to replace unpopular tax on carbon emissions with market-based trading system year ahead of schedule.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Kevin Rudd announced a plan to replace a deeply unpopular tax on carbon emissions with a market-based trading system a year ahead of schedule.

headline.main: Australian Leader Scraps Tax on Carbon Emissions
